channel.title: Banned from the server?
channel.description:
Why did I get banned?
I understand my brother griefed but I can not control his actions. And to make up for what he did I walked all the way to the city he griefed and used my own supplies to fix as much damage as I could. See, this is why I quit the last time. This server is full of immature children, I know it's a game but for the love of god, grow up.
I have done nothing but befriended other players, build and try to help out whoever I can, but some people on this server think Minecraft is a place to act E-Hard and raid your allies and destroy the work you put into building things.
The only two reports against me are below: • Where I broke some Lapis Lutzi; I apologize. Vizard told me it wasn't allowed and I stopped. • Where I placed cobblestone by lava; I was trying to stop the lava flow..

item.title: Banned from the server?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

Well I just checked my chests and someone edited it. There is an item that looks like fire, called undefined item.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from the server?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar X, post:11, topic:399320”]I logged in and a giant chunk of my town was reset? And the part that wasn’t reset was griefed.[/quote]Not sure what happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from the server?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:9, topic:399320”]I know from firsthand experiance that Mr Mopar and this Mr Mopar X are two different people because I’ve played with both of them at the same time on the old map, in fact they both defended Corey’s varrock while my clan attacked it, so they are two brothers for sure. I’m still not going to just unban you since I don’t know the details, I’ll let the person who actually banned you handle that.[/quote]I’ve already handled it don’t worry. Also apparently the worldmap isn’t updating.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from the server?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I know from firsthand experiance that Mr Mopar and this Mr Mopar X are two different people because I’ve played with both of them at the same time on the old map, in fact they both defended Corey’s varrock while my clan attacked it, so they are two brothers for sure. I’m still not going to just unban you since I don’t know the details, I’ll let the person who actually banned you handle that.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from the server?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

[quote=“PLayRooney, post:6, topic:399320”][quote author=Mr Mopar X link=topic=496456.msg3629388#msg3629388 date=1308087261]
We have separate Moparscape accounts, separate e-mails, separate social site accounts such as Myspace and Facebook. Furthermore, I have just recently made my Moparscape account and he has had his since 2007. I also have two close real life friends that play that can voucher that we are two separate family members. Also, we often go on Minecraft at the same time and he helps me build and what not.

There is no way for me to provide you %100 solid evidence. The only way is to trust what I am saying.
[/quote]
You should try and get yur brother and yourself online at the same time and get into a conversation with a mod/admin and prove to them you are not the one person.[/quote]

We have before. But it would be kind of hard now since we are both banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from the server?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

I agree 100% about the immaturity of the people on moparcraft, and i guess they banned you because your name was similar to your brother’s =\

Read full topic

Furthermore, I have just recently made my Moparscape account and he has had his since 2007. I also have two close real life friends that play that can voucher that we are two separate family members. Also, we often go on Minecraft at the same time and he helps me build and what not.

There is no way for me to provide you %100 solid evidence. The only way is to trust what I am saying.[/quote]

item.title: Banned from the server?

item.title: Banned from the server?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

You need to prove that it’s actually your brother on the other account, or at least provide a convincing story. Anyone could just login with a different name from the same computer, do a load of griefing, and then say OH IT WAS MY BROTHER SORRY.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from the server?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

No? If you notice, all of the reports are on Mr_Mopar (my brother), not me.

Read full topic
